notes.text:
This update for wpa_supplicant fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2015-0210: Fix broken certificate subject check (bsc#915323.)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: wpa_supplicant 2.0-16 does not properly check certificate subject name, which allows remote attackers to cause a man-in-the-middle attack.
notes.title: CVE description
